content1: VanillaMC Season 4 released! This new season introduces a ton of new mechanics and features, including custom enchants, custom items, and more!
content2: VanillaLauncher v1.0.0 released! This is the very first version of VanillaLauncher. It's still in beta, so bugs or issues are to be expected.
content3: EaglercraftX 1.8 u46 released. * Fix pointer lock issue (sorta) * WASM client autosave the world
